Accio Page!

Lost? – What are you doing wandering the corridors at night?!

The old o2js.com blog is in process of being merged.
Chances are that what you are looking for has been removed,
and it will be added some time in the future.

Though, thanks to the witches and wizards who’ve created the wayback machine, once something becomes public, it never gets lost ;)

So you might be interested in browsing the internet archives for even older versions of this blog.

You might also want to browse the old site for the articles that I have not converted yet.

There is also a repository of articles that have not been migrated yet.

I know, it’s messy :) — I'm trying to clean it up as my time permits.

Volkan.
